DefaultEvent.Description:
The coffin is banded with iron and triple locked. LEAVE FOR THE CHIEF, it's labelled.

The Austere Acolyte is standing over it with a crowbar and a fixed expression.
DefaultEvent.Name: A locked coffin

ChildBranches.Name: Find out what she wants
ChildBranches.Description: Perhaps there will be something in it for you.

Description: The Acolyte sends you a message, requesting assistance with a difficult autopsy. The message emphasizes silence and discretion.
Name: Summons to the Low Building
